refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the values of ident_number, aircode, material_code, and LOS for the specified region.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Sets the values of ident_number, aircode, material_code, and LOS for the specified region.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the item command to set the ident number, air code, material code, and LOS for a specified region.

example.title: Setting the values for a region.

listitem.para: Sets the ident number to 1137, air code to 0, material code to 8, and LOS to 100 for region_1.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
